title: Plai mission
h2: Our mission is formulated as follows

mission-data.title: Supporting artists:
mission-data.text: We provide resources and platforms for their creativity and development.

mission-data.title: Promotion of art and cultural heritage:
mission-data.text: We raise awareness of the value of art and heritage among citizens, popularize works of art.

mission-data.title: Involvement of the public in supporting artists:
mission-data.text: We engage the public through charity events, sponsorships and cultural initiatives.

mission-data.title: Innovative and educational projects:
mission-data.text: We develop education and creative skills, implement innovative approaches.

mission-data.title: Cooperation and international exchange:
mission-data.text: We actively cooperate with artists and organizations at the national and international level to exchange ideas and projects.
